title: The Importance of Calling the Roll in the Classroom
story: What's the teacher doing, Richard? She is calling the roll, Jennifer. What does it mean? It is to check who is in class today. What should I do? When she calls your name, say "here." What is that for? So that she knows you are here today.
summary: Learn why calling the roll is an essential part of classroom management and how it helps teachers keep track of attendance and create a safe learning environment.
image: An image of a teacher holding a class roster and calling out names during roll call.
